Windlord::

"Then we go with you, Ragnar, and will speak with your 
leader "replied Windlord "but if I or my friend aren't agree with 
your leader's policys then I'm afraid that we leave you... "



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "Not really Windlord.  I am a warrior.  You are my friend.  
Where you 
> go I go."  He begins glancing around wary of being surrounded 
without his 
> knowing.
